page.title: 15A Typical Weekend
page.content: {Chris Talintyre aged 11 I wake up on Saturday about seven,get out of bed run down the stairs,get the paper and run back up.Then I go with my sisters and mum to Bridgwater,my sisters go to gymnastics my mum and I go shopping.After lunch I go for a ride on my pony in the woods.On Sunday we might go to the club or for a bike ride.Sometimes we walk on the hills or ride in the car. {Paula Collins Aged 10 I get up at 8.00,have breakfast and play in the garden until the others wake up.I make them a cup of tea and toast.We get dressed and take the dogs for a walk.My sister and I make the beds and hoover.Sometimes I do the ironing,we help to get the dinner and wash up.After that we go and play with a friend in the village.On Sunday we go to church;after we play swingball.
